channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: YouTube loosens profanity rules for monetized videos
item.description: YouTube is tweaking its profanity-related rules to allow creators to monetize videos with swearing in them, provided the profanity is contained to the...

item.title: US Senator Urges DHS to Probe Whether Agents Were Moved From Criminal Cases to Deportations
item.description: US Senator Ron Wyden is demanding that the Department of Homeland Security investigate reports of agents being reassigned to bolster immigration enfor...

item.title: AIR lands $23M to bring its eVTOLs to the US
item.description: Israel-based eVTOL startup AIR has raised $23 million to scale production of both its piloted and uncrewed cargo aircraft, and enter the U.S.

item.title: Google says it will sign EU’s AI code of practice
item.description: Google confirmed it will sign the European Union's general purpose AI code of practice. Meta has already said it will not sign the voluntary framework...

item.title: Observe continues to adapt to the changing world of software observability
item.description: Observe just raised a $156 million Series C round as the company looks to offer support for Apache Iceberg by the end of the year.

item.title: Gen AI apps doubled their revenue, grew to 1.7B downloads in first half of 2025
item.description: People are downloading and spending money on Gen AI apps more than ever.

item.title: TernX Review (2025): Travel With Young Kids Just Got Easier
item.description: This carry-on suitcase can transform into a simple stroller, perfect for weekend trips with a little one.

item.title: 15 Best Laptops (2025), WIRED-Tested and Approved
item.description: Our expert team of laptop testers stand behind these Windows laptops, MacBooks, Chromebooks, and Linux portables.

item.title: The Best Kindle of 2025: Paperwhite, Scribe, or Colorsoft?
item.description: Here’s how Amazon’s ebook readers stack up—and which one might be right for you.

item.title: 9 Best Smartwatches (2025): Apple, Wear OS, Hybrid & Kids' Watches
item.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.
